name: On Thin Line
description:
Xbox controller is preferred.

(Seriously, if you want to pass the game.)

Control (Upper Left corner "Switch" button to switch between control modes)

1. XBox Controller Mode:

Left Stick Vertical Axis  - move

Button A - hit

Both Triggers Down - start game/back to menu

2. Keyboard & Mouse Mode:

Mouse - move

Space - hit

Both Esc and Enter - back to menu

A beautiful adventure story with music and rhythm.It was made for Ludum Dare game jam with the theme "Combine Two  Incompatible Genres".
